reg_info.act_under: Racing Commission Act, 2000   Loi de 2000 sur la Commission des courses de chevaux

content.content: 1. The amount of a penalty prescribed for the purposes of subsection 11 (8) of the Act is $1,500. O. Reg. 664/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The amount of a penalty prescribed for the purposes of subsection 11 (8) of the Act is $1,500. O. Reg. 664/00, s. 1.
